salerevenuereport

Class GenerateReport

  • java.lang.Object
    • salerevenuereport.GenerateReport

  • public class GenerateReport
extends java.lang.Object
    GenerateReport - Generate a monthly revenue report or revenue report for the day from CSV
    Since:
    2021-11-03
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Heng Zheng Ping

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int countQuantity
      integer variable that stores quantity of each menu item for each month or day
      private static int day
      integer variable that stores day
      private static double daySales
      double variable that stores sales of the day
      private static IndividualSaleRecordFactory isrf
      IndividualSaleRecordFactory class to load individual sale record from CSV
      private static MenuItemFactory mif
      MenuItemFactory class to load menu item from CSV
      private static int month
      integer variable that stores month
      private static double monthlySales
      double variable that stores sales in each month
      private static java.lang.String[] monthStr
      String variable that stores Month for displays
      private static RevenueRecordFactory rrf
      RevenueRecordFactory class to load revenue record from CSV

      double variable that stores revenue of the year
      private static double totalSales
      double variable that stores sales of each individual menu items
      private static int year

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GenerateReport() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void GenerateMonthlyReport()
      Generate Monthly Revenue Report The monthly sales of each menu item of the current year will be reported It will print out each individual item of every month in the following format: quantity x menu item name............totalSales Total monthlySales will be add up together if the month and year in the revenuerecord CSV matches the current month and year The monthlySales will be add up to calculate the total revenue of the year
      static void GenerateReportForTheDay()
      Generate Revenue Report for the day The sales of each menu item will be reported if the day, month and year in the individualsalerecord CSV matches the current day, month and year It will print out each individual item in the following format: quantity x menu item name............totalSales The daySales will be add up together if the day, month and year in the revenuerecord CSV matches the current day, month and year

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • GenerateReportForTheDay

        public static void GenerateReportForTheDay()
        Generate Revenue Report for the day The sales of each menu item will be reported if the day, month and year in the individualsalerecord CSV matches the current day, month and year It will print out each individual item in the following format: quantity x menu item name............totalSales The daySales will be add up together if the day, month and year in the revenuerecord CSV matches the current day, month and year

      • GenerateMonthlyReport

        public static void GenerateMonthlyReport()
        Generate Monthly Revenue Report The monthly sales of each menu item of the current year will be reported It will print out each individual item of every month in the following format: quantity x menu item name............totalSales Total monthlySales will be add up together if the month and year in the revenuerecord CSV matches the current month and year The monthlySales will be add up to calculate the total revenue of the year
